context.description: With the YAKINDU Statechart editor you create or modify state models.

topic.label: First steps creating a state machine

context.title: YAKINDU Statechart Element Properties
context.description: Init, history and shallow history states are pseudo states used to express special aspects.

context.title: YAKINDU Statechart Element Properties
context.description: States are the central elements of a state machine.

context.title: YAKINDU Statechart Element Properties
context.description: Expressions are used to declare events, variables etc. and to define behavior.

context.title: YAKINDU Statechart Element Properties
context.description: A transition is the transfer of one state to another. Transitions are diagrammed as arrows and can carry events and actions but must not.
